description: Try this vegetable-packed pumpkin soup recipe on a cold night. Top it off with spiced roasted chickpeas and a side of naan for a warm Indian inspired-meal.
name: Pumpkin Soup with Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook for 4 minutes or until softened. Add stock and 2 cups water. Bring to the boil.
Add pumpkin and parsnip. Return to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 25 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Cool slightly.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a frying pan. Add chickpeas, cumin, coriander, then season with salt. Cook, stirring, for 8 minutes or until golden.
Use a stick blender to pur√©e soup. Return to heat. Stir in the zucchini. Cook for 3 minutes or until the zucchini is tender and soup is reheated. Season.
Ladle into bowls. Top with a dollop of yoghurt, chickpeas and coriander. Serve with naan bread.
